page.title: 15FARMING: LIVESTOCK.
page.content:
We found out about the livestock kept at Spott Farm Glenprosen. Chart Showing Types And Numbers
Blackface ewes 888. Texal Cross ewes 38. Suffolk Cross ewes 20 Tups (male sheep) 18 Lambs total 1985 850. Cows 46. Calves 41. Bulls 1.
Other animals on the farm are 2 highland cows,3 ponies, 1 ferret, 2 collie sheepdogs,1 poodle,3 cats and 3 kittens. The ferret catches rabbits and is a pet.The collie sheepdogs are used for rounding up sheep. One pony is ridden by the farmer's daughter and the other two run about the hills.
